summary: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.
cast: Richard Carlson|Barbara Rush|Charles Drake|Joe Sawyer|Russell Johnson|Kathleen Hughes|Ralph Brooks|Robert Carson|Ned Davenport|Edgar Dearing|Alan Dexter|George Eldredge|Whitey Haupt|Robert 'Buzz' Henry|Bradford Jackson|Casey MacGregor|Kermit Maynard|Virginia Mullen|Dick Pinner|William Pullen|George Selk|Dave Willock
title: Vinieron del espacio
